# Front Arena exported extension module.
# source          ""
# timestamp (utc) "2024-04-12 01:15:40.1"
# ***** DO NOT EDIT! *****
#
name        "PS_FO_Customisation"
description "$Id$"

groups {
}

decls[FColumnDefinition] {
  "ThPrice Undiscounted" ( "sheet columns.dealpackagesheet" "sheet columns.dealsheet" "sheet columns.portfoliosheet" ) "";
  "ThVal Undiscounted" ( "sheet columns.dealpackagesheet" "sheet columns.dealsheet" "sheet columns.portfoliosheet" ) "";
}

clx FTradingSheet [FColumnDefinition] {
  ThPrice Undiscounted =
  Description=Undiscounted Theoretical Price
  ExtensionAttribute=thPriceUndiscounted
  Format=Price
  GroupLabel=MMLD Custom Calculations
  labellist=ThPrice Undiscounted
  Name=ThPrice Undiscounted


  ThVal Undiscounted =
  Description=Undiscounted Theoretical Value
  ExtensionAttribute=thValUndiscounted
  Format=Price
  GroupLabel=MMLD Custom Calculations
  labellist=ThVal Undiscounted
  Name=ThVal Undiscounted


}

decls[FExtensionAttribute] {
}

clx FSingleInstrumentAndTrades [FExtensionAttribute] {
  discountFactorFromValuationModel = instrument:discountFactorFromValuationModel;
  thPriceUndiscounted = theoreticalPrice / discountFactorFromValuationModel;
  thValUndiscounted = theoreticalValue / discountFactorFromValuationModel;
}

clx FTradeRow [FExtensionAttribute] {
  discountFactorFromValuationModel = instrument:discountFactorFromValuationModel;
  thPriceUndiscounted = theoreticalPrice / discountFactorFromValuationModel;
  thValUndiscounted = theoreticalValue / discountFactorFromValuationModel;
}

decls[FExtensionValue] {
}

clx CCompactTradeEntryAppFrame [FExtensionValue] {
  CustomLayout_FrontOfficePane
vbox(;
  hbox(;
    trade_insaddr;
    trade_Quantity;
    trade_Nominal;
    hbox(;
        trade_Price;
        trade_ViceVersa;
    );
    trade_Currency;
    trade_Counterparty;
    trade_prfnbr;
    trade_buy_sell;
  );
  hbox(;
    trade_time;
    trade_value_day;
    trade_acquire_day;
    trade_trader_usrnbr;
    trade_acquirer_ptynbr;
    trade_Broker;
    trade_fee;
    trade_Market;
  );
  hbox(;
    trade_Premium;
    trade_accrued_int;
    trade_sales_person_usrnbr;
    trade_sales_credit;
    trade_Status;
    trade_your_ref;
    trade_trdnbr;
  );
  hbox(;
    trade_optkey1_chlnbr;
    trade_optkey2_chlnbr;
    trade_optkey3_chlnbr;
    trade_optkey4_chlnbr;
    trade_Text1;
    trade_Text2;
  );
);
...

}

clx CInsDef_AUTOCALLABLE [FExtensionValue] {
  CustomLayout_FrontOfficePane
vbox(;
  hbox(;
    vbox{;
      trade_Quantity;
      trade_Nominal;
      hbox(;
        salescover_SalesMargin;
        salescover_SalesCoverEnabled;
      );
      salescover_TraderPrice;
      trade_Price;
      trade_Premium;
      trade_Currency;
      hbox(;
        trade_IndependentAmount;
        trade_IndependentAmountAsPercentage;
      );
      trade_prfnbr;
      trade_PositionPair;
      trade_Broker;
      trade_fee;
    };
    vbox{;
      trade_Counterparty;
      trade_hostid;
      trade_MirrorPortfolio;
      trade_your_ref;
      trade_DiscountingType;
      trade_value_day;
      trade_acquire_day;
      trade_time;
      trade_acquirer_ptynbr;
      trade_trader_usrnbr;
      salescover_TraderPortfolio;
      salescover_TraderAcquirer;
      trade_SettleCategoryChlItem;      
      trade_Market;      
      trade_ordnbr;
      trade_locked_info;      
      trade_position;
    };
  );
 vbox{;
  hbox(;
    vbox(;
      hbox(;
        premiumTranslation_FxRate;
        trade_fx_get_rate;
      );
      premiumTranslation_FxPortfolio;
    );
    vbox(;
      premiumTranslation_SettleCurrency;
      premiumTranslation_FxAcquirer;
    );
    vbox(;
      premiumTranslation_FxPrice;
    );
  );
 };
  hbox(;
    vbox{;
      trade_optkey1_chlnbr;
      trade_optkey2_chlnbr;
      trade_AdditionalInfo.DealerCode;
      trade_AdditionalInfo.DocumentType;
      trade_AdditionalInfo.TransactionPurpose;
    };
    vbox{;
      trade_optkey3_chlnbr;
      trade_optkey4_chlnbr;
    };
  );
  hbox(;
    vbox{;
      trade_sales_credit;
    };
    vbox{;
      trade_sales_person_usrnbr;
    };
  );
  hbox(;
    vbox{;
      trade_trdnbr;
      trade_Status;
    };
    vbox{;
      trade_bo_trdnbr;
      trade_payments;
    };
  );
);

  hbox(;
    vbox{;
      trade_optkey1_chlnbr;
      trade_optkey2_chlnbr;
      trade_AdditionalInfo.DealerCode;
      trade_AdditionalInfo.DocumentType;
      trade_AdditionalInfo.TransactionPurpose;
    };
    vbox{;
      trade_optkey3_chlnbr;
      trade_optkey4_chlnbr;
    };
  );
  hbox(;
    vbox{;
      trade_sales_credit;
    };
    vbox{;
      trade_sales_person_usrnbr;
    };
  );
  hbox(;
    vbox{;
      trade_trdnbr;
      trade_Status;
    };
    vbox{;

      );

        trade_IndependentAmountAsPercentage;
      );
      trade_prfnbr;
      trade_PositionPair;
      trade_Broker;
      trade_fee;
      trade_ordnbr;
      trade_locked_info;
    };
    vbox{;
      trade_Counterparty;
      trade_hostid;
      trade_MirrorPortfolio;
      trade_your_ref;
      trade_DiscountingType;
      trade_value_day;
      trade_acquire_day;
      trade_time;
      trade_acquirer_ptynbr;
      trade_trader_usrnbr;
      salescover_TraderPortfolio;
      salescover_TraderAcquirer;
      trade_SettleCategoryChlItem;
      trade_Market;
      trade_position;
    };
  );
 vbox{;
  hbox(;
    vbox(;
      hbox(;
        premiumTranslation_FxRate;
        trade_fx_get_rate;
      );
      premiumTranslation_FxPortfolio;
    );
    vbox(;
      premiumTranslation_SettleCurrency;
      premiumTranslation_FxAcquirer;
    );
    vbox(;
      premiumTranslation_FxPrice;
    );
  );
 };
  hbox(;
    vbox{;
      trade_optkey1_chlnbr;
      trade_optkey2_chlnbr;
      trade_AdditionalInfo.DealerCode;
      trade_AdditionalInfo.DocumentType;
      trade_AdditionalInfo.TransactionPurpose;
    };
    vbox{;
      trade_optkey3_chlnbr;
      trade_optkey4_chlnbr;
    };
  );
  hbox(;
    vbox{;
      trade_sales_credit;
    };
    vbox{;
      trade_sales_person_usrnbr;
    };
  );
  hbox(;
    vbox{;
      trade_trdnbr;
      trade_Status;     
    };
    vbox{;
      trade_bo_trdnbr;
      hbox(;
        trade_payments;
        trade_save_new;
      );
    };
  );
);
...

}

      );

        trade_IndependentAmount;

    };
    vbox{;
      trade_Counterparty;
      trade_hostid;
      trade_MirrorPortfolio;
      trade_your_ref;
      trade_CollateralAgreement;
      trade_DiscountingType;
      trade_value_day;
      trade_acquire_day;
      trade_time;
      trade_acquirer_ptynbr;
      trade_trader_usrnbr;      
      salescover_TraderPortfolio;
      salescover_TraderAcquirer;      
      trade_SettleCategoryChlItem;
      trade_Market;
      trade_position;
    };
  );
 vbox{;
  hbox(;
    vbox(;
      hbox(;
        premiumTranslation_FxRate;
        trade_fx_get_rate;
      );
      premiumTranslation_FxPortfolio;
    );
    vbox(;
      premiumTranslation_SettleCurrency;
      premiumTranslation_FxAcquirer;
    );
    vbox(;
      premiumTranslation_FxPrice;
    );
  );
 };
  hbox(;
    vbox{;
      trade_optkey1_chlnbr;
      trade_optkey2_chlnbr;
      trade_AdditionalInfo.DealerCode;
      trade_AdditionalInfo.DocumentType;
      trade_AdditionalInfo.TransactionPurpose;
    };

      trade_optkey4_chlnbr;
    };
  );

    };

  );

      trade_prfnbr;
      salescover_TraderPortfolio;
      trade_Counterparty;
      trade_hostid;
      trade_MirrorPortfolio;
      trade_your_ref;
      trade_CollateralAgreement;      
      hbox(;
        ins_DiscountingType;
        ins_suggest_discounting_type;
      );
    };
    vbox{;
      trade_time;
      trade_acquirer_ptynbr;
      salescover_TraderAcquirer;
      trade_sales_person_usrnbr;
      trade_trader_usrnbr;
      trade_SettleCategoryChlItem;
      trade_Broker;
      trade_fee;
    };
  );
  hbox(;
    vbox{;
      trade_optkey1_chlnbr;
      trade_optkey2_chlnbr;
      trade_AdditionalInfo.DealerCode;
      trade_AdditionalInfo.DocumentType;
      trade_AdditionalInfo.TransactionPurpose;
    };
    vbox{;
      trade_optkey3_chlnbr;
      trade_optkey4_chlnbr;
    };
  );
  hbox(;
    vbox{;
      trade_trdnbr;
      trade_Status;
    };
    vbox{;
      trade_bo_trdnbr;
      hbox(;
        trade_payments;
        trade_save_new;
      );
    };
  );

    vbox{;
      trade_AmountForeign;
      trade_prfnbr;
      trade_PositionPair;
      hbox(;
        salescover_SalesMargin;
        salescover_SalesCoverEnabled;
      );
      salescover_TraderPrice;
      trade_Price;
      trade_Premium;
      trade_ForwardPremium;
      trade_FxoPremiumCurr;
      hbox(;
        trade_IndependentAmount;
        trade_IndependentAmountAsPercentage;
      );
      trade_Broker;
      trade_fee;
      trade_Market;
    };
    vbox{;
      trade_AmountDomestic;
      trade_Counterparty;
      trade_hostid;
      trade_MirrorPortfolio;
      trade_your_ref;
      trade_CollateralAgreement;
      trade_DiscountingType;
      trade_value_day;
      trade_acquire_day;
      trade_time;
      trade_acquirer_ptynbr;
      trade_trader_usrnbr;
      salescover_TraderPortfolio;
      salescover_TraderAcquirer;      
      trade_SettleCategoryChlItem;
      trade_ordnbr;
      trade_locked_info;
    };
  );
  hbox[Delta Hedge;
    trade_fx_delta_hedge_type;
    trade_fx_delta_hedge_btn;
  ];
 vbox{;  hbox(;
    vbox(;
      hbox(;
        premiumTranslation_FxRate;
        trade_fx_get_rate;
      ); 
      premiumTranslation_FxPortfolio;
    );
    vbox(;
      premiumTranslation_SettleCurrency;
      premiumTranslation_FxAcquirer;
    );
    vbox(;
      premiumTranslation_FxPrice;
      trade_sales_person_usrnbr;
    );
  );  
 };
  hbox(;
    vbox{;
      trade_optkey1_chlnbr;
      trade_optkey2_chlnbr;
      trade_AdditionalInfo.DealerCode;
      trade_AdditionalInfo.DocumentType;
      trade_AdditionalInfo.TransactionPurpose;
    };
    vbox{;
      trade_optkey3_chlnbr;
      trade_optkey4_chlnbr;
    };
  );
  hbox(;
    vbox{;
      trade_trdnbr;
      trade_Status;
    };
    vbox{;
      trade_bo_trdnbr;
      hbox(;
        trade_payments;
        trade_save_new;
      );
    };
  );
);
...

}

      );
      premiumTranslation_FxPortfolio;
    );
    vbox(;
      premiumTranslation_SettleCurrency;
      premiumTranslation_FxAcquirer;
    );
    vbox(;
      premiumTranslation_FxPrice;
    );
  );
 };
  hbox(;
    vbox{;
      trade_optkey1_chlnbr;
      trade_optkey2_chlnbr;
      trade_AdditionalInfo.DealerCode;
      trade_AdditionalInfo.DocumentType;
      trade_AdditionalInfo.TransactionPurpose;
    };
    vbox{;
      trade_optkey3_chlnbr;
      trade_optkey4_chlnbr;
    };
  );
  hbox(;
    vbox{;
      trade_sales_credit;
    };
    vbox{;
      trade_sales_person_usrnbr;
    };
  );
  hbox(;
    vbox{;
      trade_trdnbr;
      trade_Status;     
    };
    vbox{;
      trade_bo_trdnbr;
      hbox(;
        trade_payments;
        trade_save_new;
      );
    };
  );
);

decls[FPythonCode] {
}

clx FObject [FPythonCode] {
  FValidationBack2Back
import ael

SCP = 1 << 19 # Sales Cover Parent bit
SCM = 1 << 7  # SCM B2B bit

force_inherit_list = ['optkey3_chlnbr', 'optkey4_chlnbr']

def validate_transaction(transaction_list, *rest):
    for entity, operation in transaction_list:
        if operation == 'Delete':
            continue
        if entity.record_type != 'Trade':
            continue
        group_trade = entity.group_trdnbr
        if group_trade is None:
            continue
        if group_trade.trdnbr == entity.trdnbr:
            continue
        group_process = group_trade.trade_process
        if (SCP & group_process > 0) and (SCM & group_process > 0):
            for att in force_inherit_list:
                val = getattr(group_trade, att)
                if val is not None:
                    setattr(entity, att, val)
    return transaction_list




...

  FValidationMidRate
import ael, acm
import FValidationUtils

market = 'REFINITIV_SPOT'
def GetLivePricesFromMarket(ins,curr,market = 'REFINITIV_SPOT'):
    query = f"market='{market}' and instrument='{ins}' and currency='{curr}'"
    livePrices = acm.FPrice.Select(query)
    price =  livePrices[0] if livePrices else 0.0
    bid = price.Bid() if price else 0
    ask = price.Ask() if price else 0
    return (bid+ask)/2

def validate_transaction(transaction_list, *rest):
    for entity, operation in transaction_list:
        if entity.record_type == 'Trade' and operation in ('Insert', 'Update') and entity.status in ('Reserved', 'FO Confirmed', 'BO Confirmed') and entity.insaddr.instype == 'Curr':
            try:
                avg_price = GetLivePricesFromMarket(entity.insaddr.insid, entity.curr.insid)
                FValidationUtils.set_addinfo(entity, 'ClientRate', str(avg_price))
            except Exception as e:
                print(str(e))

    return transaction_list

...

  FValidationPortfolio
import ael, acm

import FValidationUtils

def validate_transaction(transaction_list, *rest):
    for entity, operation in transaction_list:
        if entity.record_type == 'Trade' and entity.insaddr.instype in ['Bill', 'Bond', 'FRN'] and entity.category != 'Collateral' and operation in ('Insert', 'Update'):
            
            try:
                portfolio_name = entity.prfnbr.prfid if entity.prfnbr else 'None'
                FValidationUtils.set_addinfo(entity, 'BondPortfolio', portfolio_name)
            except Exception as e:
                print(str(e))

    return transaction_list



...

  FValidationUtils

import ael, acm

'''
    addinfo management
'''

def set_addinfo(obj, addInfoName, addInfoValue):
    '''
        Set addinfo value on object.
         addInfoValue must be a string.
    '''

    found = False

    for ai in obj.additional_infos():
        if ai.addinf_specnbr.field_name == addInfoName:
            ai.value = addInfoValue
            found    = True

    if not found:
        addInfoNew                = ael.AdditionalInfo.new(obj)
        addInfoNew.value          = addInfoValue
        addInfoNew.addinf_specnbr = ael.AdditionalInfoSpec[addInfoName]

def delete_addinfo(obj, addInfoName):
    for ai in obj.additional_infos():
        if ai.addinf_specnbr.field_name == addInfoName:
            try:
                ai.delete()
            except:
                print("Failed to delete '%s'" % addInfoName)
                

...

  PSPriceDataVerification


from datetime import date

from datetime import datetime
from email.mime.multipart import MIMEMultipart
from email.mime.text import MIMEText

from FParameterSettings import ParameterSettingsCreator
import acm

import ael

import FRunScriptGUI

import FLogger

import smtplib



logger = FLogger.FLogger("PriceDataVerification")
SMTP_SETTINGS = ParameterSettingsCreator.FromRootParameter('SMTPSettings')

tt_absolute_threshold_stale = "Absolute threshold value for stale price check. Stale price check is for 5 days(T+4) for instruments and 3(T+2) days for FX rates"
tt_price_spike_percent = "Enter the price spike in percentage of the yesterday's price"

# email parameters
HOST = SMTP_SETTINGS.SMTPServer()
PORT = SMTP_SETTINGS.SMTPPort()
FROM = SMTP_SETTINGS.SenderAddress()
USERNAME = SMTP_SETTINGS.SMTPUsername()
PASSWORD = SMTP_SETTINGS.SMTPPassword()
TLS = SMTP_SETTINGS.SMTPTLS()


class PriceDataVerification(FRunScriptGUI.AelVariablesHandler):



    def get_query_folders(self):
        """ Get query folders from database """
        rules = acm.FStoredASQLQuery.Select("subType='FInstrument'")
        return rules

    def get_query_folders_currency(self):

        """ Get query folders from database """
        return acm.FCurrencyPair.Select('')

    def get_markets(self):

        """ Get market places """

        mkts = acm.FMTMMarket.Select("")

        return mkts



    def __init__(self):

        vars = [

        # 0-name, 1-field name_tab, 2-data_type, 3-values, 4-default value, 5-Mandatory, 6-'', 7-tooltip, 8-enable/disable method, 9-enable/disable
        ['ins_query', 'Instruments', 'string', self.get_query_folders(), '', 0, 1, 'Select Instrument Query Folder', self.checkInsQuery, 1],
        ['cur_query', 'Currency Pair', 'string', self.get_query_folders_currency(), '', 0, 1, 'Select Currency Pair Query Folder', self.checkCurrPairQuery, 1],

        ['market','Market','string',self.get_markets(), '', 1, 0, 'Select market to obtain prices from', None, 1],
        ['absolute_threshold_stale', 'Threshold Stale Price', 'float', None, 1.0, 1, 0, tt_absolute_threshold_stale, None],
        ['price_spike_percent', 'Price Spike', 'float', None, 1.0, 1, 0, tt_price_spike_percent, None],
        ['send_email_to', 'EmailID', 'string', None, 'trading.risk@bankmandiri.co.id', 1, 1, 'Enter emailid to send notification to', None, 1],

        ]

        FRunScriptGUI.AelVariablesHandler.__init__(self,vars)

    def checkInsQuery(self, index, fieldValues):
        queryfolder = fieldValues[index]
        if not queryfolder:
            ael_variables[self.ael_variables.cur_query.sequenceNumber][5] = 1
        else:
            ael_variables[self.ael_variables.cur_query.sequenceNumber][5] = 0
        return fieldValues

    def checkCurrPairQuery(self, index, fieldValues):
        queryfolder = fieldValues[index]
        if not queryfolder:
            ael_variables[self.ael_variables.ins_query.sequenceNumber][5] = 1
        else:
            ael_variables[self.ael_variables.ins_query.sequenceNumber][5] = 0
        return fieldValues

ael_variables = PriceDataVerification()

def get_price(instrument, market, date) -> acm.FPrice:
    """ Get prices from user specified market
    Input:

        instrument - acm.FInstrument

        market - string
    Output:
        acm.FPrice

    """
    #acm_instrument = acm.FInstrument[instrument]
    acm_market = acm.FMTMMarket[market]
    query = "instrument = %s and market = %i and day = %s" % (instrument.Oid(), acm_market.Oid(), date)
    price = acm.FPrice.Select01(query, "")
    if  price :
        today_bid = price.Bid() if price.Bid() and str(price.Bid()) != 'nan'  else 0
        today_ask = price.Ask() if price.Ask() and str(price.Ask()) != 'nan'  else 0
        today_settle = price.Settle() if price.Settle() and str(price.Settle()) != 'nan'  else 0
        if today_bid or today_ask or today_settle:
            return price

def GetLivePricesFromMarket(market, currencyPair, date):
    instrument, currency = currencyPair.split('/')

    ins = acm.FInstrument[instrument]
    curr = acm.FCurrency[currency]
    acm_market = acm.FMTMMarket[market]

    query = f"market = {acm_market.Oid()} and instrument = {ins.Oid()} and currency = {curr.Oid()} and day = {date}"

    livePrices = acm.FPrice.Select(query)
    if livePrices:
        price = livePrices[0]
        bid = price.Bid() if price.Bid() and str(price.Bid()) != 'nan'  else 0
        ask = price.Ask() if price.Ask() and str(price.Ask()) != 'nan'  else 0
        settle = price.Settle() if price.Settle() and str(price.Settle()) != 'nan'  else 0
        if bid or ask or settle:
            return price


def valid_price(price):
    return price if price and str(price) != 'nan'  else 0

def check_price_spike(todayPrice, prevPrice, spike):
    price_check = 0
    if todayPrice:
       if todayPrice > (prevPrice + prevPrice * spike) or todayPrice < (prevPrice - prevPrice * spike):
            price_check = 1
    else:
        # this for handling the missing price
        price_check = 1
    return price_check

def check_stale_price(todayPrice, prevPrice, threshold ):
    price_check = 0
    if todayPrice:
       if prevPrice >= (todayPrice - threshold) and \
        (todayPrice + threshold) >= prevPrice :
            price_check = 1
    else:
        price_check = 1
    return price_check


def send_email(body, subject, recipients):
    try:
        msg = MIMEMultipart()
        msg['From'] = FROM
        msg['To'] = recipients
        msg['Subject'] = subject
        msg.attach(MIMEText(body, 'plain'))
        server = smtplib.SMTP(HOST, PORT)

        #for TLS connection
        server.ehlo()
        server.starttls()

        server.login(USERNAME, PASSWORD)
        server.sendmail(FROM, recipients, msg.as_string())
        server.quit()
        logger.LOG('Email sent succesfully')
    except Exception as ex:
        print("Error while sending email", str(ex))

def ael_main(ael_variables):

    """ Task main function to execute """
    send_emailid = ael_variables['send_email_to']
    send_emailid = list(send_emailid)
    recipients = ','.join(send_emailid)
    todayDate = acm.Time().DateNow()

    ins_query = ael_variables['ins_query'] if ael_variables['ins_query'] else []
    cur_query = ael_variables['cur_query'] if ael_variables['cur_query'] else []

    if not cur_query and not ins_query:
        print("Select instruments or currency pairs")

    market = ael_variables['market']

    absolute_threshold_stale = ael_variables['absolute_threshold_stale']
    price_spike_percent = ael_variables['price_spike_percent']
    Spike = price_spike_percent / 100

    instruments = []
    currPairs = []

    for each_query in ins_query:

        acm_query = acm.FStoredASQLQuery[each_query]
        if acm_query is not None:
            instruments.extend(acm_query.Query().Select())

    for curpair in cur_query:
        valid_date = ael.date_from_string(todayDate)
        valid_date = valid_date.to_string('%Y-%m-%d')
        TodayPrice = GetLivePricesFromMarket(market, curpair, valid_date)
        PriceCheckDays = 2

        if TodayPrice:
            logger.LOG("Prices found for <%s> in Market <%s> for date <%s>" % (curpair, market, valid_date))

            previousDate = todayDate
            for PriceCheckCtr in range(1, PriceCheckDays+1):
                price_checks = []
                previousDate = acm.Time().DateAddDelta(previousDate, 0, 0, -1)
                while TodayPrice.Currency().Calendar().IsNonBankingDay(None, None, previousDate):
                    previousDate = acm.Time().DateAddDelta(previousDate, 0, 0, -1)

                valid_date = ael.date_from_string(previousDate)
                valid_date = valid_date.to_string('%Y-%m-%d')
                PrevPrice = GetLivePricesFromMarket(market, curpair, valid_date) #get_price(ins, market, valid_date)

                if PrevPrice:
                    price_checks.append(check_stale_price(valid_price(TodayPrice.Bid()), valid_price(PrevPrice.Bid()), absolute_threshold_stale))
                    price_checks.append(check_stale_price(valid_price(TodayPrice.Ask()), valid_price(PrevPrice.Ask()), absolute_threshold_stale))
                    price_checks.append(check_stale_price(valid_price(TodayPrice.Settle()), valid_price(PrevPrice.Settle()), absolute_threshold_stale))

                    if all(price_checks):
                        if PriceCheckCtr == PriceCheckDays:
                            logger.LOG("Sending email for stale price")
                            body = """Market data for {0} in market {1} hasn't change for 3 consecutive days. Please verify.""".format(curpair, market)
                            subject = 'Market Data Stale - {0}'.format(market)
                            send_email(body, subject, recipients)
                    else:
                        break
            logger.LOG("Stale Price check done succesfully for {}".format(curpair))

            # checking for stale price
            previousDate = todayDate
            price_checks = []
            previousDate = acm.Time().DateAddDelta(previousDate, 0,0, -1)
            while TodayPrice.Currency().Calendar().IsNonBankingDay(None, None, previousDate):
                previousDate = acm.Time().DateAddDelta(previousDate, 0,0, -1)
            valid_date = ael.date_from_string(previousDate)
            valid_date = valid_date.to_string('%Y-%m-%d')
            PrevPrice = GetLivePricesFromMarket(market, curpair, valid_date)
            if PrevPrice:
                price_checks.append(check_price_spike(valid_price(TodayPrice.Bid()), valid_price(PrevPrice.Bid()), Spike))
                price_checks.append(check_price_spike(valid_price(TodayPrice.Ask()), valid_price(PrevPrice.Ask()), Spike))
                price_checks.append(check_price_spike(valid_price(TodayPrice.Settle()), valid_price(PrevPrice.Settle()), Spike))

                if all(price_checks):
                    logger.LOG("Sending email for price spike")
                    body = """Market data for {0} in market {1} has changed for more than {2}%. Please verify.""".format(curpair, market, price_spike_percent)
                    subject = 'Market Data Spike - {0}'.format(market)
                    send_email(body, subject, recipients)

            logger.LOG("Spike Price check done succesfully for {}".format(curpair))
        else:
            logger.WLOG("Prices not found for <%s> in Market <%s> for date <%s>" % (curpair, market, valid_date))

    for ins in instruments:
        logger.LOG("Processing Instrument %s" % ins.Name())
        valid_date = ael.date_from_string(todayDate)
        valid_date = valid_date.to_string('%Y-%m-%d')

        TodayPrice = get_price(ins, market, valid_date)

        if ins.InsType() == "Curr":
           PriceCheckDays = 2
        else:
           PriceCheckDays = 4

        if TodayPrice:
            logger.LOG("Prices found for <%s> in Market <%s> for date <%s>" % (ins.Name(), market, valid_date))

            previousDate = todayDate
            for PriceCheckCtr in range(1, PriceCheckDays + 1):
                price_checks = []
                previousDate = acm.Time().DateAddDelta(previousDate, 0, 0, -1)
                while TodayPrice.Currency().Calendar().IsNonBankingDay(None, None, previousDate):
                    previousDate = acm.Time().DateAddDelta(previousDate, 0, 0, -1)
                valid_date = ael.date_from_string(previousDate)
                valid_date = valid_date.to_string('%Y-%m-%d')

                PrevPrice = get_price(ins, market, valid_date)
                if PrevPrice:
                    price_checks.append(check_stale_price(valid_price(TodayPrice.Bid()), valid_price(PrevPrice.Bid()), absolute_threshold_stale))
                    price_checks.append(check_stale_price(valid_price(TodayPrice.Ask()), valid_price(PrevPrice.Ask()), absolute_threshold_stale))
                    price_checks.append(check_stale_price(valid_price(TodayPrice.Settle()), valid_price(PrevPrice.Settle()), absolute_threshold_stale))

                    if all(price_checks):
                        if PriceCheckCtr == PriceCheckDays:
                            logger.LOG("Sending email for stale price")
                            body = """Market data for {0} in market {1} hasn't change for {2} consecutive days. \
                                Please verify.""".format(ins.Name(), market, PriceCheckDays+1)
                            subject = 'Market Data Stale - {0}'.format(market)
                            send_email(body, subject, recipients)
                    else:
                        break
            logger.LOG("Stale Price check done succesfully for {}".format(ins.Name()))


            previousDate = todayDate
            price_checks = []
            previousDate = acm.Time().DateAddDelta(previousDate, 0,0, -1)
            while TodayPrice.Currency().Calendar().IsNonBankingDay(None, None, previousDate):
                previousDate = acm.Time().DateAddDelta(previousDate, 0,0, -1)
            valid_date = ael.date_from_string(previousDate)
            valid_date = valid_date.to_string('%Y-%m-%d')

            PrevPrice = get_price(ins, market, valid_date)
            if PrevPrice:
                price_checks.append(check_price_spike(valid_price(TodayPrice.Bid()), valid_price(PrevPrice.Bid()), Spike))
                price_checks.append(check_price_spike(valid_price(TodayPrice.Ask()), valid_price(PrevPrice.Ask()), Spike))
                price_checks.append(check_price_spike(valid_price(TodayPrice.Settle()), valid_price(PrevPrice.Settle()), Spike))

                if all(price_checks):
                    logger.LOG("Sending email for price spike")
                    body = """Market data for {0} in market {1} has changed for more than {2}%. \
                    Please verify.""".format(ins.Name(), market, price_spike_percent)
                    subject = 'Market Data Spike - {0}'.format(market)
                    send_email(body, subject, recipients)

            logger.LOG("Price spike check done succesfully for {}".format(ins.Name()))
        else:
            logger.WLOG("Prices not found for <%s> in Market <%s> for date <%s>" % (ins.Name(), market, valid_date))



...

}
